name: Goo Paradox
description:
A game about motherships fighting over human cities. Your goal is destroy enemy ship and got all these fuel to himself.

Left click - Movement.

Right click - Launch Missile.

Hover over city to gather fuel. Sometimes it will also give ypu a power ups.

A small gamejam project made on unity.

Music & SFX by https://soundcloud.com/fazz-2
